item.title: X-Dyna: Expressive Dynamic Human Image Animation
item.description: X-Dyna: a novel diffusion-based pipeline generates realistic human image animation using a zero-shot approach by integrating a Dynamics-Adapter for dynamic detail preservation, exceeding state-of-the-…

item.title: METAGENE-1: Metagenomic Foundation Model for Pandemic Monitoring
item.description: METAGENE-1, a 7-billion parameter language model, achieves state-of-the-art results in pathogen detection and genomic embedding by leveraging a massive wastewater metagenomic dataset.
